org.azyva.dragom.execcontext.plugin

Interface EventPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ExecContextPlugin

    public interface EventPlugin
extends ExecContextPlugin
    Manages NodeEvent's at the ExecContext level.
    Author:
    David Raymond

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void raiseNodeEvent(NodeEvent nodeEvent)
      Raises a NodeEvent.

      void      		 registerListener(Node node, NodeEventListener<NodeEventClass> nodeEventListener, boolean indChildrenAlso, boolean indTransient)

    • Method Detail

      • registerListener

        <NodeEventClass extends NodeEvent> void registerListener(Node node,
                                                         NodeEventListener<NodeEventClass> nodeEventListener,
                                                         boolean indChildrenAlso,
                                                         boolean indTransient)
        Registers a NodeEventListener for NodeEvent's raised on a Node.

        The NodeEventListener is associated with the specified Node, but within the ExecContext. It can be bound to workspace or tool scope depending on indTransient.

        It is also possible to register NodeEventListener's directly on a Node, and thus within the Model.

        Generally NodeEvent's are raised (by NodePlugin's, tools or other) by calling Node.raiseNodeEvent(org.azyva.dragom.model.event.NodeEvent) which after having dispatched the Event to EventListener's registered within Node's, calls the raiseNodeEvent(org.azyva.dragom.model.event.NodeEvent) method to dispatch the Event to EventListener's registered within the ExecContext.

        Type Parameters:
        NodeEventClass - NodeEvent class.
        Parameters:
        node - Node.
        nodeEventListener - NodeEventListener.
        indChildrenAlso - Indicates if NodeEvent raised on children should be dispatched to the NodeEventListener.
        indTransient - Indicates if the NodeEventListener is to be bound to tool scope, as opposed to workspace scope.

      • raiseNodeEvent

        void raiseNodeEvent(NodeEvent nodeEvent)
        Raises a NodeEvent.

        The NodeEvent is dispatched to all NodeEventListener's interested in it which have been registered within the ExecContext using registerListener(org.azyva.dragom.model.Node, org.azyva.dragom.model.event.NodeEventListener<NodeEventClass>, boolean, boolean).

        The NodeEvent sub-interface (ModuleEvent or ClassificationNodeEvent) must match the type of Node.

        Parameters:
        nodeEvent - NodeEvent.
